verse:
एतज्ज्ञेयं नित्यमेवात्मसंस्थं नातः परं वेदितव्यं हि किञ्चित्‌।
भोक्ता भोग्यं प्रेरितारं च मत्वा सर्वं प्रोक्तं त्रिविधं ब्रह्ममेतत्‌॥

terms.वेदितव्यं: should be sought to be known

meaning: This knowledge should be known that the God resides within the self and there is nothing beyond it. One should seek to know this as eternal. Indeed, there is nothing else that needs to be known. Understanding, knowing the 3 as the jeev(enjoyer, experiencer), the maya(enjoyed, experienced), and the God (motivator, inspirer), everything has been declared as threefold
